snippet.title: Slime Rancher: VR Playground - Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
The Slime Rancher: VR Playground is a fun new way to experience the Far, Far Range!

Download the free DLC here: https://store.steampowered.com/app/939480/Slime_Rancher_VR_Playground/

Play with the adorable slimes of Slime Rancher in VR! Explore unique VR playgrounds based off of popular locations in the Far, Far Range and get face-to-face with some of your favorite slimes like: pink, tabby, and phosphor.

The VR Playground is a unique Slime Rancher experience created especially for VR and does not include the full expanses of the Far, Far Range.

Follow us to stay up to date on news and events!

http://www.twitter.com/monomipark
http://www.instagram.com/monomi_park
http://www.blog.monomipark.com


Developed by Monomi Park and 3lb Games
http://www.slimerancher.com
http://www.monomipark.com
